title: Best of the Program | Guest: Marion Smith | 10/9/19
description:
World chaos is accelerating FAST. A new chart shows just how CRAZY our banks are acting. And Turkey has entered Syria with a goal of wiping out all the Kurds. The Nazarene Fund is doing all it can to save those in danger, but the organization needs YOUR help. China is getting WAY more aggressive. Marion Smith, the executive director of Victims of Communism, calls in with the facts: Communist China is THE DEADLIEST entity in world history! The NBA must stop bending to its will, as it just did by kicking out two fans for chanting “free Hong Kong.”
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
